attributes.action: bring into law a "Freedom of Speech" Act modelled on the US Constitution's First Amendment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is much confusion about what can and cannot be said in today's Britain without risking arrest and prosecution. This causes a "chilling effect" in debate. All expression must be explicitly protected other than in specific and unambiguous proscribed circumstances. To that end, the British people should have a clear and simple "Freedom of Speech" Act, which enshrines their right to self expression.
